text: Paul Shah (नेपाली : पल शाह) is a Nepalese film actor and model known for his work in Kollywood. He was featured in over 200 music videos before entering the Nepalese film industry. Shah got his film break through Nai Nabhannu La 4, which was a commercial success. Since then has made appearance in the commercially successful romantic drama Ma Yesto Geet Gauchu, action film Johnny Gentleman and family drama Satru Gate. 14 months later, he starred in the social romantic drama Bir Birkam 2, part of the Bir Bikram series, opposite Barsha Siwakoti, Najir Hussain and Buddhi Tamang, which was directed and produced by Milan Chams. The film received a mixed response from critics. The film was a moderate success at the box office. He will star in the sequel of his previous film Ma Yesto Geet Gauxu, titled as Ma Yesto Geet Gauxu 2, opposite Pooja Sharma, which will be directed by Sudarshan Thapa, who also directed its prequel. The film will be released on Falgun 23, 2076. He will also star in Hridaya Bhari, which will be directed by Suraj Subba, opposite Shraddha Chettri, a Kolkata-based Nepali model and actor. The film was slated to be released on Bhadra 27, 2076, but due to post-production issues, it was delayed to 2077. ==Filmography== ===Notable Music videos=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !
